participant_1.background:
I like to be comfortable when I'm working so I usually wear scrubs.
I love to learn about the universe and everything in it, so I spend my days reading science books, watching documentaries, and exploring nature.
I'm not sure if I'll be able to balance my work and my personal life.
my best friend lives in a big city.
I'm relaxing at home and enjoying some time to myself after my trip to London.

participant_2.background:
I am a librarian, but my passion is playing the violin.
I live in a quiet neighborhood with my dog.
i am married and have five children.
I spent time with my family and enjoyed the local culture.
my motor never stops running.

content.text: Good morning to you, too! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks! I just got back from a trip to London.
Oh, that sounds exciting! What did you do there?
I visited all of the typical tourist spots, like the Tower of London and Westminster Abbey. But I also spent a lot of time exploring the city on foot.
That sounds like a great time! I've always wanted to go to London.
You should definitely go! It's a beautiful city with a lot to offer.
Maybe I will one day. In the meantime, I'll have to live vicariously through you!
Haha, I'm happy to share my travel stories.
What do you do for a living?
I'm a scientist, and I love my job. I get to learn about the universe and everything in it.
That sounds like a really interesting job. I'm a librarian, but my passion is playing the violin.
That's awesome! I love to play the violin too.
We should have a jam session sometime!
